Either I'm stupid or can't find stuff, I can't see an option on the cheat menu for infinite electricity

Short thread, I think we should have an option for electricity, thanks!

doesn't infinite fuel give you infinite electricity? 

If not you could try using hyperedit, that allows you to refill or drain any resource.

I've found that if you've already ran out of energy and then activate the "infinite fuel" cheat, you still can't control the craft. Once it runs out of energy there isn't a stock way to hack control of it again. Is this the issue you're getting? o-O

> 
> I've found that if you've already ran out of energy and then activate the "infinite fuel" cheat, you still can't control the craft. Once it runs out of energy there isn't a stock way to hack control of it again. Is this the issue you're getting? o-O

Yeah this. With EVA fuel it works this way too. If you run out and then turn the Infinite EVA fuel cheat on, you're still dead in the water.

If you don't want hyper edit or you don't want to edit the save file, you could use infinite fuel and then attach a big booster to a probe core with a claw and some solar panels on it. Then you can just fly out to your craft really fast and attach with the claw to re-fill....Yeah, just use hyper edit...

You can always disable 1 battery and if you run out of power enable it for few seconds, after your craft starts producing power again disable it for future use.

Btw I call it hibernation mode ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
